title: ICornerReliefFeatureData.ReleaseSelectionAccess
description: Releases access to the selections that define this sheet metal corner relief feature.
remarks:
ICornerReliefFeatureData::AccessSelections
puts the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature.
Use this method to restore the rollback state if you did not modify the feature or use
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
if you did.
